name: obsidian-mcp
description: MCP server for interacting with Obsidian knowledge bases
long_description: This MCP server enables AI models to interact with Obsidian knowledge bases through the Model Context Protocol. It provides tools for reading, creating, updating, and deleting notes, as well as managing folder structures and searching vault content.

tools.name: list_notes
tools.description: List all notes in the Obsidian vault

tools.name: read_note
tools.description: Read the content of a note in the Obsidian vault

tools.name: create_note
tools.description: Create a new note in the Obsidian vault

tools.name: update_note
tools.description: Update an existing note in the Obsidian vault

tools.name: search_vault
tools.description: Search for content in the Obsidian vault

tools.name: delete_note
tools.description: Delete a note from the Obsidian vault

tools.name: move_note
tools.description: Move or rename a note to a new location in the Obsidian vault

tools.name: manage_folder
tools.description: Create, rename, move, or delete a folder in the Obsidian vault

api_token.title: API Token
api_token.description: API token for Obsidian Local REST API plugin

api_port.title: API Port
api_port.description: API port for Obsidian Local REST API
